name: Avoid Everything!
description:
Avoid Everything is a Arcade Endurance game with one simple objective!

  • Multiple Game Modes, including Co-op!
  • Pick up and play!
  • Just one button in order to play! Wow!

Game Made By: Brandon Guerra (@thebmanishere)

Music Made By: Mark Sparling (Thanks Mark!) (@Markmark665, http://marksparling.com/)
